Configuration.Name: L1=L2=20m
Configuration.SetupScript:
# config.wavelength = 8.1 # config.wavelength_spread = 0.1 # config.det = 19250 # config.det_offset = 0 # config.srce = 30 # config.guide = 'lens' # config.apx = -98 # config.bs = 5 # config.beamcenterx = 92.98 # config.beamcenterz = 92.13
# config.drive() # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # !!! Warning: it is not recommended to manually drive the attenuator sics.drive('nvs_speed', 25476) sics.set('/instrument/velocity_selector/wavelength', 5) sics.set('/instrument/velocity_selector/wavelength_spread', 0.1) driveDet(19250, 0) driveEntRotAp(150) driveGuide('ga') sics.drive('apx', -98) selBs(2) sics.set('beamcenterx', 91.86) sics.set('beamcenterz', 94.43)
